name: Staying Alive (EmilyEm)
description: Staying Alive is a 2D survival game played by mouse. You control four characters to survive 20 days and discover the answers behind the story. Characters have three attributes: health, mood, and power, and undergo random events which might affect those stats. Go out into the world to explore and gather materials in order to build and make food at home. There is a day and night cycle, and the player will need to pay attention and balance the characters' attributes.
